nodes.text: Rolf was a male Human who, by c. 19 BBY, had became a member of a group of Believers on the planet Genarius, under the command of Alina Impeveri.

Rolf viewed himself as a lover, but when in situations where there was no opportunity for him to make a new female aquaintance, or pilot a starship through the Cularin system asteroid belt, he was happy to instead throw grenades at his enemies.
